title: Deshpande on Investing in Europe in 2020
itunes:title: Deshpande on Investing in Europe in 2020
description:
Abhay Deshpande, Chief Investment Officer at Centerstone, discusses the differences in the markets between the end of 2018 and the end of this year. He says a clear picture on Brexit and the ECB under Christine Lagarde provide good catalysts for investors in 2020.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
